info.name: hotelbooking API
info.description: Hotel Booking API - A Go Echo-based REST API for hotel booking management. Includes guest authentication, hotel search, booking management, and admin inventory/reporting features.

request.description: Check if the Hotel Booking API is running

item.name: auth

request.description: Login as a guest user (email or phone)

item.description: Authentication endpoints for guests and admins

item.name: hotels

request.description: Get detailed information about a specific hotel (public endpoint)

item.description: Public hotel search and detail endpoints

request.description: Check availability for a specific room (public endpoint)
Get all bookings for the current guest (requires authentication)
Get invoice for a booking (requires authentication)
Add a photo to a hotel property (admin only)
List all photos for a hotel property (admin only)
Create a new room type (admin only)
Set rates for a room on specific dates (admin only)
Get rates for a room (admin only)
Add a photo to a room (admin only)

query.description: Room Type ID (required if room_id is empty)
Room ID (required if room_type_id is empty)

request.description: List photos for a room (admin only)
Create a new admin user (admin only)
Get summary report for a date range (admin only)
